summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 46W page 120 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Yesler's Third Addition, Lots 1 to 6, incl., portion of Lot 7 south of Lake Washington Blvd., Block 44, Lots 3 to 8, incl., Block 54, Lots 24 to 31, incl., Block 51, Lake Washington Shorelands, that portion of Leschi Park lying easterly of Lakeside Ave., Lot 1, Block 53, Lake Washington Shorelands, located along Lakeside Ave. adjacent to Leschi Park, from Neighborhood Business (BN) Zone to Community Business (BC) Zone.
